text:
I would prefer to remove the dependency to the (not maintained anymore)
excalibur-io library and modify the source code to use commons-io (in sync with
Cocoon). As Antonio pointed out, there is a replacement function in commons-io
for every function in excalibur-io. My experiences from doing the modifications
for 1.4.x are that this is an easy task.

Replaced excalibur-io by commons-io and made the changes in the java code in rev
366498.
